speaker: char
text: Darling, do you need a stone statue for your saloon? I’m afraid I turned another suitor into one.

speaker: char
text: Or rather he turned himself into a statue, it was all his fault, wasn’t it. All he had to do was focus on talking to me rather than on my impeccable makeup.

speaker: char
text: I’m really excited about this next one though. She seems like she’s really interested in me as a person.

speaker: char
text: She was even asking me questions about myself, can you believe it?

speaker: char
text: I want to look really pretty for this one. Just something subtle, no outlandish features, if you wouldn’t mind.
